name: Save a Cat
description:
Save a Cat is a point-and-click HTML5 game for Gamedev.js Jam 2022. It is built with Phaser 3, and image assets are hosted on IPFS. Uploading and pinning to IPFS was done using 4EVERLAND. The dream is to expand on this and make an MMORPG with NFTs :)

Note: Sometimes images may take minute(s) to load or fail to load due to transient latency in IPFS. (Workaround is to refresh the page until it works.)

Source code: https://github.com/zoan37/save-a-cat
